sentence.Network_en: I tried to adopt a curled-up position to avoid damaging my limbs.
sentence.Network_cn: 我努力保持蜷曲的姿势以免四肢受伤。

sentence.Network_en: For a while, she lost the use of her limbs.
sentence.Network_cn: 好一会儿她四肢都动弹不得。

PerfectNetExp.abs: My limbs were weary and stiff ., 我累得手脚发麻.

thank you so much Nick for the inspiration you have given me , not only by your web site and your words , but also by your courage and ability as a 12 old boy who dared to fly without limbs …谢谢你这么多的灵感尼克你给我，不仅是您的网站和你的话，而且还为你的勇气和一个12岁的男孩谁也不敢飞没有四肢的能力…
a person who has had one or more limbs removed by amputation被截肢者被截去一个或更多个肢体的人
Your bloomed in my youthful limbs , like a glow in the sky before the sunrise ., 你柔柔的花蕾 , 在我年轻青的肢体上开了花 , 好像日出前天空中的一道曙光.

entry.def: Your limbs are your arms and legs.

example.ex: She would be able to stretch out her cramped limbs and rest for a few hours.
example.tran: 她将能伸展一下蜷缩的四肢，休息几个小时。

entry.def: The limbs of a tree are its branches.

example.ex: This entire rickety structure was hanging from the limb of an enormous leafy tree.
example.tran: 这整个快要散架的搭建物吊挂在一棵枝繁叶茂的大树的枝杈上。

entry.tran: 冒着遭受失败（或指责）的风险；处于孤立无援的境地
entry.def: If someone goes out on a limb, they do something they strongly believe in even though it is risky or extreme, and is likely to fail or be criticized by other people.

example.ex: They can see themselves going out on a limb, voting for a very controversial energy bill.
example.tran: 他们可以预见到要是给极具争议性的能源法案投赞成票，可能会陷入孤立。

entry.def: If someone threatens to tear you limb from limb, they mean that they are extremely angry with you, and may use violence against you.

example.ex: The police were lucky they found him before I did. I would have torn him limb from limb.
example.tran: 警察很幸运，比我先找到了他。不然我真会把他大卸八块的。

auth_sentence.content: He just vanishes into the frantic tangle of limbs.
auth_sentence.res_content: He just vanishes into the frantic tangle of limbs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He just vanishes into the frantic tangle of limbs.

auth_sentence.content: These limbs, the unworthy temple of Thy spirit.

auth_sentence.content: Soldiers who lose limbs in combat do receive compensation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Soldiers who lose limbs in combat do receive compensation.
